proposal: Hey there, Capybara enthusiasts! Congrats on reaching 173 holders in the ETH network, that's no small feat! 🎉 Your Capybara is not just dreaming of a Lambo, but also making strides in the crypto world. Imagine if Capybara could have its own DEX or a lottery system, wouldn't that be something? Our B2B tools can help make that happen. Remember, in this game, you're not just playing, you're creating. Let's help Capybara reach for the stars... and the Lambo! 🚀🚗
